definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: In place of Isaac, God provided a ram for Abraham to sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 神为亚伯拉罕预备了献祭的公羊，代替以撒。

sentences.english: Xie Jianxian, You should also think of yourimmolation, Chong Lou prepares to kick you out the game.
sentences.chinese: 邪剑仙，你也该想想自己，重楼正预备把你踢出游戏。

sentences.english: The soldiers of Baker Company , 31st Infantry, would be in reserve.
sentences.chinese: 陆军31步兵团的B连被留作为预备队。

sentences.english: registration with the people's armed forces departments at the county level.
sentences.chinese: 县人民武装部办理预备役军官登记。

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考核结果作为任免预备役军官职务的主要依据。

sentences.english: Preparatory classes (kachi, or nursery) were formally incorporated into the system in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 在1988年，学前预备班也正式加入了该体系中。

sentences.english: What pre-cycle screening tests are required, how much do they cost, and will my insurance provide coverage for these tests?
sentences.chinese: 预备周期要做哪些筛选实验，费用多少，保险有用吗？

sentences.english: And the dangerous offense is a type of criminal attempt.
sentences.chinese: 着手实行是犯罪预备与犯罪未遂的关节点。

sentences.english: Effects of different preparation procedures on abutment surface roughness.
sentences.chinese: 不同预备程序对基牙表面粗糙度的影响。

sentences.english: The god has prepared four rivers for the human, that explains the Holy Ghost plentiful supply.
sentences.chinese: 神给人预备了四道河，那是说明到圣灵丰满的供应。

sentences.english: So the Levites made preparations for themselves and for the Aaronic priests.
sentences.chinese: 所以利未人为自己和祭司亚伦的子孙，预备祭物。

sentences.english: Yet every morning there was God's provision waiting to be gathered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，到每天清晨，神却预备了食物供他们收取。

sentences.english: The horse is made ready for the day of battle, but victory rests with the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 马是为打仗之日预备的，得胜乃在乎耶和华。

sentences.english: Musette bag with ammo, my webbing, my. 45, canteen…
sentences.chinese: 携物袋加预备弹药，我的伪装网，45手枪，水壶。

sentences.english: Glyph of Preparation: This glyph resetting the cooldown on dismantle is questionable at best.
sentences.chinese: 预备雕文能重置拆卸是有很大问题的。

sentences.english: Every week on P-Day I go to the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 我每个预备天都会去超级市场。

definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate
to dress (troops)/to line up (to arrange in a straight line)
to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
